attributes.action: Abolish the rule that those who crash into the back of a car are responsible
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is because of this outdated rule that evil corrupt 'crash-scammers' are cashing in off innocent people. I feel this rule should be abolished and no party should be found responsible until the accident has been investigated thoroughly by an accredited investigator. This way crash-scammers will be an extinct species
